name: Quality Inn & Suites Yacht Club Basin

reviews.text: A colleague and I came to Houston (Johnson Space Center to be exact) to conduct astronaut training for an experiment flying on an upcoming shuttle mission. Our travel agent booked rooms at the Holiday Inn Express in Seabrook. When we went to our rooms after checking in mine had a strong terrible smell making any thought of actually sleeping impossible. My colleague's room had a large cockroach. When we asked the front desk to please move us to different rooms, they refused and made rude statements to us. We were too stunned to be outraged that a National chain like Hoiiday Inn could treat their customers so rudely. We went elsewhere and decided to fight the battle of getting a refund even though they made it clear they wouldn't offer any.
reviews.title: Stay away from this place

reviews.text: We stayed at the Holiday Inn Express for two nights in July.. The hotel is a nice place to stay.. Its right between the Kemah Boardwalk and NASA so it is a good location..
reviews.title: Not Bad

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Room - The room was nice and clean.. The beds were very comfortable and the sheets were clean.. The pillows were nice.. We all slept well.. The A/C unit was really nice.. It kept the room nice and cool..
reviews.title: Good place to stay

likes.disliked: — Not many shops within walking distance

reviews.text: The Bathrooms - When we arrived, there were used soap bars and used courtesy shampoo bottles in the bathtub.. The main light above the bathroom sink was not working.. The shower head was terrible.. The pressure was fine but the shower head flow options were lousy.. The tubs were also very slippery..
reviews.title: Wonderful!
Spaceships and more
reviews.text: The Pool - The pool was really nice.. They have done a nice job with the landscaping.. The pool is near the street but the landscaping hides it..

Stayed at this hotel for 2 nights while on a business trip. The hotel is not new but well kept, I got upgraded to a king-bed suite which had tile floor in the bathroom, and a standing shower. It was a fairly cheap room, location is good if you wish to be near Nasa or the Kemah boardwalk.
reviews.title: Nice affordable hotel, would recommend

reviews.text: The best part of the stay was the staff, they went out of their way to make my stay enjoyable. I would return and recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Great Hotel Experience

reviews.text: My family and I (about 10 rooms total) stayed here for two nights for a wedding. We all had an incredible experience!
reviews.title: Deserves a better rating

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.text: The staff at Quality Inn in Seabrook offered the best hotel service I have ever received. The rooms were very clean and comfortable beyond expectations, but paying more money would (obvisouly) find you higher luxury. The traffic on Nasa Road 1 towards I-45 got to be a bit cluttered at times. Other than that, I cannot find anything negative to say about this place. I will be back and I would urge friends to stay here.
reviews.title: Staff was very attentive & made helpful recommendations re: places to eat

aka: Quality Inn And Suites Yacht Club Basin
description: The Quality Inn Seabrook Yacht Club Basin is minutes away from the Kemah Boardwalk, NASA Space Center and Galveston, Clear Lake businesses, restaurants, shops and attractions. The hotel is within walking distance to Seabrook Classic Cafe, Cabo, and Lance's Turtle Club. Don Julios and easy access to LaPorte, Webster, League City, Friendswood, Pasadena, Texas City, Deer Park, and Houston. This Property features free hot breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet, business center, fitness center, meeting room, guest laundry, free parking, and tropical pool with waterfall and Palapa Bar. All rooms have executive desks with ergonomic chairs, new 32 inch flat panel televisions, irons, ironing boards, coffee makers, and hair dryers. All Guestrooms rooms are equipped with microwaves, refrigerators, and exclusive Guest Suites have PullOut Sofa beds, and Queen Suites have pullout Loveseats. The hotel is located half block from the water and Lakewood Yacht Club is within walking distance.
